body_html:
@786694836 Is this still an issue? Did you try?

Do as the warning says:

The following rc files are no longer being read, please transfer their contents or import their path into one of the standard rc files:
/home/abb/tensorflow/tools/bazel.rc

add:
import /home/abb/tensorflow/tools/bazel.rc

to .bazelrc file.

body:
@786694836 Is this still an issue? Did you try?

> Do as the warning says:
> 
> The following rc files are no longer being read, please transfer their contents or import their path into one of the standard rc files:
> /home/abb/tensorflow/tools/bazel.rc
> 
> add:
> import /home/abb/tensorflow/tools/bazel.rc
> 
> to .bazelrc file.
